% Text for ICNT workshop


% ----------------- title -------------------------

\title{International Collaborations in Nuclear Theory: Theory for open-shell nuclei near the limits of stability}

% ----------------- author(s) -------------------------

\institute{}

\date{May 11-29, 2015, Michigan State University and FRIB/NSCL
